review: In November 2017, my mother-in-law was visiting from Maharashtra and suddenly developed breathing issues. We admitted her to Manipal Hospital Whitefield. Dr Pradeep Haranahalli who was at the emergency saw her and diagnosed her condition as atrial fibrilation and arrhythmia. He told us that her heartbeat needs to be stabilized and then see the cause of the of high heartbeat. He mentioned that it will take 1 to 2 days for the heartbeat to to stabilize. And he was bang on. She recuperated in the four days and was discharged. Dr Pradeep really took care of her and was very patient for our questions and gave a very thoughtful and balanced answer. One time I called him to ask a question after 9 PM but he didn't pick up the phone, as he might be busy. So I thought he may not call me back but to my surprise he did call me and clarified my question (I was happy). After her heartbeat was stabilized he said that she needs to be on medication and there is no need for surgery. He also did an angiogram and told there were no blockages. I feel this doctor is really good and he is not trying to make $$$ unnecessarily by scaring the patient's family(under duress), as some do. He is a very calm, quiet, ************* and thoughtful Doctor who gives ear to the patient's family. Once I told to the doctor that the food was not given on time to the patient in HDU. So immediately he summoned the nurses / canteen manager and told them such things should not have happened and not to happen again. He also very nicely and clearly explained the anti blood clot medications (the new one vis-a-vis the world one). I really appreciate his selfless treatment. Thank you Doctre.

I still maintain contact with him even so many months after she was released from the hospital. I may mention here that my wife is at present okay by the grace of God.

review:
First time I visited Doctor Pradeep Haranahalli was in 2017, regarding the heart condition of my father. My father lives in Odisha, 83 years that time, had then undergone angioplasty in one of his arteries. The second artery needed rotablation, which the doctor in Bhubaneswar was hesitant to do. So I decided meet 3-4 famous cardiologists in Bangalore (Narayani Hridalaya, Manipal old airport rd) with my father's reports and take opinion. What struck me about Dr Pradeep is his silent confidence. He was through, made detailed notes, saw all the reports/CDs. He was confident that the proceedure can be safely done despite of old age. He clearly conveyed to us that age is not a factor in such surgeries. We liked his attitude because it was different from other doctors who discouraged us to try anything because of old age. (My father was fit otherwise). I was living in US that time where people drive till 88 years if they are healthy.
We decided to go with Doctor Pradeep because of his thoroughness, confidence, accessibility. In 2018 my father came down from Odisha and after check up was decided to implant pacemaker. Dr Pradeep took a special care, from admission till discharge. He himself was present with the nurses in all post -surgical processes. He was very patient with my father, in mobilizing him etc. Today my father has a big trust on him. He lives in Odisha and I moved to another country but we are in contact with Doctor Pradeep via phone, whatsapp on medicine doses, advice etc. We are fortunate to have met Dr Pradeep. We highly recommend others. He wants to genuinely help patients.

review: I (Dipak Kumar Dash) visited Dr Pradeep (at Manipal Hospital Whitefield) as my father (Jagannath Dash) suddenly complained about increased chest pain. He was having this known health issue in the past seven years but now the condition was bad and needed an immediate attention. Previously he was under assumption that he was having some minor leakage in heart for which he was already consuming tablets but without any significant outcome. By god's grace things fell in place just at the right time as we met Dr Pradeep.  He started diagnosing my father step by step from beginning through various tests. Very soon he arrived at the conclusion that my father is having some serious blockage in left main coronary artery that was causing the chest pain. He then called upon Dr. Vivek Babu Bojjawar, discussed the issue, and recommended to go for CABG procedure as the blockage was more than 70 percent and angioplasty stenting won't be successful. I am very much thankful to both Dr Pradeep and Dr Vivek who clearly explained me the current condition and also explained why CABG was necessary. They provided me adequate clinical information that helped me to confidently provide my consent for the CABG procedure. All went as per the schedule. The procedure was successfully carried out by Dr Vivek, Dr Pradeep and their expert team of doctors that took around 4 hours. In a week's time my father was discharged from hospital. In little more than a month he was fully recovered and back to normal. Now he is completely back to life. Just within 3 months of time lot many things have changed for good. To speak few words about Dr Pradeep, he is a very nice person who listened to all our concerns very carefully and provided his expert recommendation. A very highly responsible and approachable person who understands and respects patient's sentiments. ** *** *** **** ********* ** *** ***** *** quick enough in taking the right decision. Thank you so much Dr Pradeep for everything.
